notesStmt.note: The first three leaves and the last leaf are not fully preserved.
[...] ben Zekharyah Alboni?: inscribed with his name in the colophon, folio 206v.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Former Prophets, accentuated and punctuated, with masorah magna and parva.

collation.p: 21 quires of 10 leaves each, apart from the first and the last quire, which have only 8 leaves each. The quires are signed with Hebrew letters on the first page and marked with catchwords on the last page.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental square script, punctuated, of the 15th century. Benayah ben Se'adyah ben Zekharyah ben Margaz: inscribed with his name in the colophon, folio 206v. For manuscripts of the same scribe see Or 2210, 2211, 2348, 2375 (128, 138, 89, 147.
